actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-823.

official_title: Resolution authorizing printing of annual report of the National Forest Reservation Commission for the fiscal year ended June 30, 1973.

summary.text: Provides that the annual report of the National Forest Reservation Commission for the fiscal year ended June 30, 1973, be printed with an illustration as a Senate document.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing printing of annual report of the National Forest Reservation Commission for the fiscal year ended June 30, 1973.
